compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

coreCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

coreCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/workspaces/graphql-serverless-project/m.serviceRawFile:
service: graphql-serverless

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x

functions:
  query:
    handler: handler.queryHandler
    events:
      - http:
          path: query
          method: post

  mutation:
    handler: handler.mutationHandler
    events:
      - http:
          path: mutation
          method: post

  subscription:
    handler: handler.subscriptionHandler
    events:
      - http:
          path: subscriptions
          method: post

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
